# 1. Advanced Dashboard

By using the "titanic.csv" dataset, create a dashboard showing the disparities according to passenger's class on the titanic. Focus on their probability to survive but you can also cross additional variables like gender, age, fares ...

- The dashboard has to tell a story

- The dashboard has to be beautiful

- The dashboard has to be interactive

To obtain the corrections, email your answers to damien.dupre@dcu.ie.
